group_1.narration: Rika@To: Ren Isuzu@Sorry about before...
This might just sound like an@excuse to you, but I didn't lie...@I wasn't just hanging out with the girls...
I know there should be a ton of words...@Stuff I should want to say...@Stuff I should want to ask.
But the truth is that I'm scared to ask.
If I get closer to her, I'm sure we'll@have lots of fun times in the future.@But...
There might be lots of@really painful times too.
When I think about that,@I just can't seem to get@myself to write a reply.

group_1.textCenter: (...There's still time...@We could go back to the way we were...)
Yeah, no prob!@We got your back, girl!
Huh? You don't need to do that...@We're friends, after all!

group_1.narration: What is this feeling?@A crushing pressure in my chest...@Like my heart is being torn out.
I've read about this in books,@and seen it in dramas on TV...@Jealousy...

group_1.textCenter: I'll totally take the free bubble tea!

group_1.narration: She's been friends with them@way longer than with me...
Those girls must know sides of her@that I don't know a thing about.
Jealousy almost makes@it sound sort of cute...
But it's just pure envy.@...I'm ashamed of myself.@I'm pathetic...
When did I become like this?@When did I become such a@ridiculous person?
No...@It's nothing...@Nothing happened...@...Nothing at all.
Every day, without fail,@I've always written in this diary...@But right now, I can't think@of a single thing to say.
No matter how thin it may be...@Even if it's the only one...
As long as there's a single@ray of hope, whatever it@touches sparkles and shines@with beautiful colors.
But...@When there's no light, and it's all dark...@You can't see anything.@No beauty... No sparkle...
This feeling...@I don't want anyone to know about it.@I mean...
If I were to weigh this@feeling against her feelings...@There would be no balance at all.@I bet the scales would even break.
I'm so ashamed...@I'm such an idiot.
I keep telling myself…@We could go back to the way we were.
That's got to be proof that we can't.
